welcome.title: Welcome to Auto-Claude!
welcome.description: Auto-Claude is your autonomous AI coding assistant. Describe what you want to build, and the AI handles the rest - from planning to implementation. Let's explore the key features!

sidebar.title: Navigation
sidebar.description: Here you'll find all main areas: Kanban board for tasks, Ideation for new features, Roadmap for project planning, and more. Click on an area to open it.

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: The Kanban board shows all your tasks in different stages: Backlog → In Progress → Review → Done. Drag and drop tasks between columns.

createTask.title: Create Task
createTask.description: Click here to create a new task. Simply describe what you want to build - the AI analyzes your project and creates an implementation plan.

taskFlow.title: How It Works
taskFlow.description:
1. You describe the task
2. AI analyzes your code
3. AI creates a plan
4. AI writes the solution
5. AI tests and fixes bugs
6. You review the result

All automatically in an isolated Git branch!

terminals.title: Agent Terminals
terminals.description: Here you can see in real-time what the AI agents are doing. Each task runs in its own terminal - you can follow the progress live.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Here you configure Auto-Claude: language, AI model, paths, and integrations like GitHub. You can restart this tour anytime.

ready.title: Ready to Go!
ready.description:
You now know the basics. Create your first task and let Auto-Claude do the work. If you have questions, you'll find help in the settings.

Happy building!

whatsNew.title: What's New?
whatsNew.description: New features: German language support, improved path settings for WSL/Windows, and this interactive tour!

intro.title: Understanding Tasks
intro.description: A task goes through multiple phases: Specification → Planning → Coding → QA Review → Done. The AI works autonomously, but you stay in control.

status.title: Task Status
status.description:
• Backlog: Waiting to start
• In Progress: AI is working on it
• Review: Waiting for your feedback
• Done: Completed and approved

intro.title: Ideation
intro.description: Let the AI generate new feature ideas for your project. Based on your code and goals, it suggests meaningful extensions.

intro.title: Roadmap
intro.description: Plan the future of your project. The AI helps you prioritize features and create a realistic development plan.
